Locardia Ndandarika (a mụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
Nwa amaala Bindura, dị ka nwa agbọghọ Ndandarika mere ihe nlereanya na ụrọ site na iji usoro ọdịnala
N'afọ 1964, ọ lụrụ Joseph Ndandarika, gbaa ya alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1978.  N'oge alụmdi na nwunye ha, ọ mụtakwu banyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, ma mesịa tụgharịa gaa na ya oge niile
N'afọ 1986, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Workshop Gallery; a kpọkwara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Chapungu Sculpture Park
N'afọ 1990, a kpọrọ ya isonye na Commonwealth Games na New Zealand
Ndandarika egosipụtala ma nwee ọmụmụ ihe na United States, Netherlands, South Africa, na New Zealand kemgbe 1997.
Ọ bụ nne Ronnie Dongo na Virginia Ndandarika.
